name: torrents.ru clear fork
description:
http://userstyles.org/styles/3817 - fork of this theme
png after-shot:  http://s52.radikal.ru/i138/0807/cc/bd299645af44.png
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

/* ------------------------------------	*
 * Style:   torrents.ru clear    	*
 * Author:  ant[on]        	        *
 * Editor:  NekoExMachina               *
 * Version: Jun 25 2008         	*
 * ------------------------------------	*
 * Jun 25 2008:			        *
 *  	+news removal  	 	 	*	
 * 	+leftbar removal    	    	* 	 	 	   				
 * 	+avatars, flags etc removal 	*
 * Mar 31 2008:			      	*
 * 	- Ad removal            	*
 * 	                        	*
 * Feb 13 2008:			        *
 * 	- Ad removal on Main page	*
 * 	+ bottom_info           	*
 * 	                        	*
 * Nov 13 2007:			        *
 * 	- Ad removal on Main page	*
 * 	- Ad removal counters		*
 *					*
 * Oct 15 2007:			        *
 * 	- First version	                *
 * ------------------------------------	*/

@-moz-document domain(torrents.ru) {
form[action="http://www.jobsmarket.ru"],
div[id="logo"],
div[id="adriver-468x60"],
div[id="adriver-240x120"],
div[id="adriver-240x120-1"],
div[id="rle-468x60"],
div[class="med bold tCenter"],
div[class="tCenter"],
div[class="copyright"],
div[id="fp-banner"],
div[id="ad-all_bottom"],
div[id="ad-index_left_1"],
div[id="ad-index_left_2"],
div[id="ad-index_left_3"],
div[id="ad-index_left_4"],
div[id="idx-3"],
td[id="sidebar1"],
[src*="flags"],
[src*="avatars"],
div[id="latest_news"],
[src*="ranks"],
td[class="nowrap"],
div[id="page_footer"],
td[class="vBottom nowrap"] {display: none !important;}
}
